alert.note: Alert for Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:26PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Pemiscot and southwestern Lake Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 626 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bolton, or 7 miles northwest of Hayti, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Caruthersville, Portageville, Hayti, Hayti Heights, Wardell, Bolton, Bragg City, Pascola, Hathaway, North Wardell, Homestown, Stewart, Stanley, Stubtown, Swift, Hayward and Peach Orchard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
